verbs.description: [ARG0: Robert De Niro] [V: took] [ARG1: the stage] [ARGM-LOC: at Radio City Music Hall] [ARGM-PRP: for the 72nd Annual Tony Awards] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday night] , but CBS completely bleeped out his first words . " F--- Trump , " he said , referring to President Donald Trump .
